# Azumuta

---


## Solutions

- [List of Industries](https://www.azumuta.com/solutions/industry/): Explore industry-specific manufacturing solutions tailored for your sector with Azumuta.
- [Electronics Industry](https://www.azumuta.com/solutions/electronics-industry/): Optimize electronics manufacturing with digital work instructions, quality control, and traceability.

---


## Pages


---


## Content offers

- [Top AI Technology Trends in Manufacturing 2024](https://www.azumuta.com/publications/top-ai-technology-trends-in-manufacturing-2024/): Explore the latest AI advancements revolutionizing the manufacturing industry in 2024. Learn how predictive maintenance, quality control automation, and AI-driven supply chain optimization can enhance operational efficiency and competitiveness.
- [5S Audit Checklist: Everything You Need to Know](https://www.azumuta.com/publications/5s-audit-checklist-template/): Enhance your lean manufacturing processes with our free 5S Audit Checklist Template. Ensure organized, efficient, and safe workspaces by implementing structured audits that align with 5S principles.
- [Gemba Walk Checklist](https://www.azumuta.com/publications/gemba-walk-checklist/): Download our free Gemba Walk Checklist template to systematically assess and improve workplace processes. Facilitate firsthand observations to boost quality, safety, productivity, and efficiency on your shop floor.
